posts.post_content:
I'd like to buy or trade for a T206 Lajoie with bat with a Tolstoi back.

Will pay an aggressive price (though not the $2,495.95 for the PSA 5 that's currently on eBay) or trade heavily in your favor.

Feel free to contact me via PM, e-mail, posts in this thread or whatever else might be convenient.

Thanks, Rob

wolfie51sb at aol.com
